title: People's holiday
brief_description: Danish law provides that every worker in Demark is entitled to annual holidays in summer. Trades Unions and Workers Cooperatives have established Folk Ferie, an organization which arranges holidays and maintains youth hostels and beach holiday towns. Other activities include the provision of farm holidays for city industrial workers and the arrangement of international holidays.
